description:
New to Nordic? You've got this! These skis offer a solid way to start skiing. Built a little wider, they're rigid and stable underfoot. A little shorter, they're easy to maneuver on groomed trails and off the track. A supple flex and waxless base mean they're ready to glide over bumps and grip in all snow conditions.

  • Low-density wood core with large air channels provides lightweight, durable and sturdy off-trail performance
  • Rossignol's hybrid Techno cap and lacquered edges are light and stiff
  • AR Plus waxless pattern provides just the right mix of grip and glide
  • Includes Tour Step-In bindings
name: Rossignol EVO XT 60 Positrack Skis + Bindings - Unisex
